tr_quotes.quote: Uzay araştırmasına katılmayan uluslar bu teknik devrim karşısında ezileceklerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Von Daniken

tr_quotes.quote: Gökyüzü sadece uçmaktan korkanların sınırıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Bob Bello

tr_quotes.quote: Dinozorlar yok oldu çünkü bir uzay programları yoktu.
tr_quotes.author: Larry Niven

tr_quotes.quote: Uzay yere oranla neyse sonsuzlukta da zaman odur.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

tr_quotes.quote: Kozmosa ilk girişi yapmak tek başıma onunla karşı karşıya gelmek doğayla hiç görülmemiş bir düello yapmak bundan daha ötesi hayal edilebilir mi?
tr_quotes.author: Yuri Gagarin

tr_quotes.quote: Uzayın son değil ama bir sonraki sınır olduğunu ve fethedilecek bir şey olarak değil keşfedilecek bir yer olarak görüyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

tr_quotes.quote: Astronomi, ruhu yukarı bakmaya zorlar ve bizi bu dünyadan diğerine götürür.
tr_quotes.author: Platon

tr_quotes.quote: Uzay denizi boyunca, yıldızlar diğer güneşlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

tr_quotes.quote: Tüm medeniyetler ya alan yaratır ya da nesli tükenir.
tr_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

tr_quotes.quote: Evren oldukça büyük bir yer. Eğer içerisinde sadece biz varsak, korkunç bir yer israfına benziyor.
tr_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

tr_quotes.quote: Beş duyu ile donatılan insan etrafındaki evreni araştırıyor ve maceraya da “bilim” deniyor.
tr_quotes.author: Edwin Hubble

tr_quotes.quote: Dikkatimizi karasal meselelerle sınırlandırmak insan ruhunu sınırlamak olacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

tr_quotes.quote: Katılsak da katılmasak da, uzayın keşfi devam edecek ve bu, tüm zamanların en büyük maceralarından birisi.
tr_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın diğer gezegenlerde neler olup bittiğini bildiği ve belki de onları ziyaret edebileceği zaman gelecek.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ford

tr_quotes.quote: Uzay herkes içindir. Sadece bilim veya matematik alanındaki birkaç kişi için veya seçkin bir astronot grubu için değil. Bu bizim yeni sınırımız ve uzay hakkında bilgi sahibi olmak herkesin hakkı.
tr_quotes.author: Christa McAuliffe

tr_quotes.quote: Evren, gözlemleyebildiğimiz kadarıyla harika ve muazzam bir motordur. Kapsamı, düzeni, güzelliği, zulmü, onu etkileyici kılar.
tr_quotes.author: George Santayana

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer uzayda doğmuş olsaydım, uzayı ziyaret etmekten ziyade güzel dünyayı ziyaret etmek isterdim. Harika bir gezegen.
tr_quotes.author: David Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Tüm gezegenlerin etrafında döndüğü Güneş, evrende yapacak başka bir şey bulamazsa en azından bir üzümü olgunlaştırabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

tr_quotes.quote: Uzay, sanatın nefesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

tr_quotes.quote: Uzay sonsuzluğa zaman koymaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyanın sınırlarının ötesinde, boşluğun ve maddenin düzgün bir şekilde çakıştığı, geçmişin ve geleceğin sürekli ve sonsuz bir döngü oluşturduğu bir alan var. Ve, gezinip, hiç kimsenin okumadığı, akortların hiç kimsenin duymadığı bir işareti var.
tr_quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek müzeler, zamanın uzaya dönüştürüldüğü yerlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Orhan Pamuk

tr_quotes.quote: Ne zaman aya bakarsam, zaman makinesinde gibi hissediyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan, Dünya’nın üzerinde – atmosferin üstüne ve ötesine – yükselmeli, çünkü yalnızca yaşadığı dünyayı tam olarak o zaman anlayacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Sokrates

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamın amacı Güneş, Ay ve göklerin araştırılmasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anaxagoras

tr_quotes.quote: Dinozorlar yok oldu çünkü bir uzay programları yoktu.
tr_quotes.author: Larry Niven

tr_quotes.quote: Evren oldukça büyük bir yer. Eğer içerisinde sadece biz varsak, korkunç bir yer israfına benziyor.
tr_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

tr_quotes.quote: Paylaştığımız şu dünya, uzayda gezen bir kaya parçası değildir. Yaşayan canlı bir varlıktır. Bizi korur ve korunmayı da hak eder.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gökyüzü sadece uçmaktan korkanların sınırıdır
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Uzayın bilinmezlerine ulaşmak, bilgi çağında devrim yapmak için, sadece uygar olmak yeter.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gökyüzü sadece uçmaktan korkanların sınırıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Bob Bello

tr_quotes.quote: Uzay araştırmasına katılmayan uluslar, bu teknik devrim karşısında ezileceklerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Von Daniken

tr_quotes.quote: Uzay boşluğunda dönüp duran dünyamız da kanlı dramların gösterildiği sahneden başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Cengiz Aytmatov

tr_quotes.quote: Uzay araştırmalarında elde ettiğimiz bilgiler evren karşısında ufaldığımızı ve değersizliğimizi çoktan ortaya çıkarmıştır.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Von Daniken

tr_quotes.quote: Uzay, yere oranla neyse, sonsuzlukta da zaman odur.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

tr_quotes.quote: Seni ne kadar sevdiğimi bir bilsen, sen de uzayı gören insanlardan biri olurdun...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne zaman aya bakarsam, zaman makinesinde gibi hissediyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

tr_quotes.quote: Uzayın son değil ama bir sonraki sınır olduğunu ve fethedilecek bir şey olarak değil keşfedilecek bir yer olarak görüyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamın,evrenin,uzay ve zamanın,en önemlisi de bir Yaratıcı’nın ilk nedenini sorduğumuzda kendimizi birdenbire sonsuz bir sürecin içinde buluruz.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Cathcart

tr_quotes.quote: İki şey sonsuzdur İnsanoğlunun aptallığı ve evren. Fakat ikincisinden emin değilim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tüm gezegenlerin etrafında döndüğü Güneş, evrende yapacak başka bir şey bulamazsa en azından bir üzümü olgunlaştırabilir
tr_quotes.author: Galileo

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar uzaya çıkıyor, istasyonlar kuruyor, ben daha bilgisayara format atamıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kozmosa ilk girişi yapmak tek başıma onunla karşı karşıya gelmek doğayla hiç görülmemiş bir düello yapmak bundan daha ötesi hayal edilebilir mi?
tr_quotes.author: Yuri Gagarin

tr_quotes.quote: Uzayın bilinmezlerine ulaşmak, bilgi çağında devrim yapmak için, sadece uygar olmak yeter.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Paylaştığımız şu dünya, uzayda gezen bir kaya parçası değildir. Yaşayan canlı bir varlıktır. Bizi korur ve korunmayı da hak eder.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Katılsak da katılmasak da, uzayın keşfi devam edecek ve bu, tüm zamanların en büyük maceralarından birisi
tr_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

tr_quotes.quote: Astronomi, ruhu yukarı bakmaya zorlar ve bizi bu dünyadan diğerine götürür.
tr_quotes.author: Platon

tr_quotes.quote: Ne zaman aya bakarsam, zaman makinesinde gibi hissediyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

tr_quotes.quote: Yıldızlara sadece parlak noktalar olarak bakmayın. Evrenin genişliğini almaya çalışın.
tr_quotes.author: Maria Mitchel

en_quotes.quote: There is always space for improvement, no matter how long you've been in the business
en_quotes.author: Oscar De La Hoya

en_quotes.quote: I think that the ideal space must contain elements of magic, serenity, sorcery and mystery
en_quotes.author: Luis Barragan

en_quotes.quote: Some people think happiness is a luxury, but it's a necessity. You need to make space for it in your life
en_quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

en_quotes.quote: I love the desert and its incomparable sense of space
en_quotes.author: Robyn Davidson

en_quotes.quote: For me, architecture is not just creating a space to protect people but to make them dream as well
en_quotes.author: Mario Botta

en_quotes.quote: It is far better to grasp the universe as it really is than to persist in delusion, however satisfying and reassuring
en_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

en_quotes.quote: The space within becomes the reality of the building
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: When we're in that kind of childish space, we're more genuine and feel more comfortable with our friends
en_quotes.author: Evan Spiegel

en_quotes.quote: Yosemite Valley, to me, is always a sunrise, a glitter of green and golden wonder in a vast edifice of stone and space
en_quotes.author: Ansel Adams

en_quotes.quote: Make an empty space in any corner of your mind, and creativity will instantly fill it
en_quotes.author: Dee Hock

en_quotes.quote: Journalism: an ability to meet the challenge of filling the space
en_quotes.author: Rebecca West

en_quotes.quote: What we observe as material bodies and forces are nothing but shapes and variations in the structure of space
en_quotes.author: Erwin Schrodinger

en_quotes.quote: Be exactly who you are. You can fit in any space you see yourself in. Be fearless
en_quotes.author: Dawn Richard

en_quotes.quote: That's one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind
en_quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: Even in empty space, time and space still exist
en_quotes.author: Sean M. Carroll

en_quotes.quote: The eternal silence of these infinite spaces frightens me
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: Nothing exists except atoms and empty space; everything else is opinion
en_quotes.author: Democritus

en_quotes.quote: The more space and emptiness you can create in yourself, then you can let the rest of the world come in and fill you up
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

en_quotes.quote: Space is the breath of art
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: Architecture is basically the design of interiors, the art of organizing interior space
en_quotes.author: Philip Johnson

en_quotes.quote: If you are in a spaceship that is traveling at the speed of light, and you turn on the headlights, does anything happen?
en_quotes.author: Steven Wright

en_quotes.quote: For the wise man looks into space and he knows there is no limited dimensions
en_quotes.author: Zhuangzi

en_quotes.quote: Anything humans can do in space, robots can do better
en_quotes.author: Trevor Paglen

en_quotes.quote: I want my portraits to create a space where blackness can breathe
en_quotes.author: Amy Sherald

en_quotes.quote: Architecture is how the person places herself in the space. Fashion is about how you place the object on the person
en_quotes.author: Zaha Hadid

en_quotes.quote: You think of floating on a rock in space as so alien, but that's exactly what we're doing
en_quotes.author: Winnie Harlow

en_quotes.quote: Our life is full of empty space
en_quotes.author: Umberto Eco

en_quotes.quote: I would rather be a superb meteor, every atom of me in magnificent glow, than a sleepy and permanent planet
en_quotes.author: Jack London

en_quotes.quote: We are aware only of the empty space in the forest, which only yesterday was filled with trees
en_quotes.author: Anna Freud

en_quotes.quote: Space and light and order. Those are the things that men need just as much as they need bread or a place to sleep
en_quotes.author: Le Corbusier

en_quotes.quote: Inside the car is truly my own personal space
en_quotes.author: Bae Suzy

en_quotes.quote: When I'm home, I like a cozy, comfortable, calming space
en_quotes.author: Stacy Keibler

en_quotes.quote: Circles create soothing space, where even reticent people can realize that their voice is welcome
en_quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

en_quotes.quote: If the Earth gets hit by an asteroid, it's game over. It's control-alt-delete for civilization
en_quotes.author: Bill Nye

en_quotes.quote: Inner space is so much more interesting, because outer space is so empty
en_quotes.author: Theodore Sturgeon

en_quotes.quote: The feeling is constantly growing on me that I had been the first to hear the greeting of one planet to another
en_quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

en_quotes.quote: Perhaps when distant people on other planets pick up some wavelength of ours all they hear is a continuous scream
en_quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

en_quotes.quote: In a small space, you want to keep the bedding as simple as possible so it looks clean, calm and collected
en_quotes.author: Nate Berkus

en_quotes.quote: Science at NASA is all about exploring the endless frontier of the Earth and space
en_quotes.author: John M. Grunsfeld

en_quotes.quote: As an astronaut, especially during launch, half of the risk of a six-month flight is in the first nine minutes
en_quotes.author: Chris Hadfield

en_quotes.quote: Minnesota is legit. There's so much space to run, like back home in Texas
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Butler

en_quotes.quote: Hey sky, take off your hat, I'm on my way!
en_quotes.author: Valentina Tereshkova

en_quotes.quote: If you put enough smart people together in one space, good things happen
en_quotes.author: Erik Hersman

en_quotes.quote: In a modern loft, you can't just fill a space with furniture. Each piece has to be perfect
en_quotes.author: Nate Berkus

en_quotes.quote: I always begin a room with the rug; it is literally the foundation of the space. I then go on to the furniture
en_quotes.author: Lee Radziwill

en_quotes.quote: After one look at this planet any visitor from outer space would say 'I want to see the manager.'
en_quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Great industries are never made from single companies. There is room in space for a lot of winners
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: Space Mountain may be the oldest ride in the park, but it has the longest line
en_quotes.author: Ric Flair

en_quotes.quote: Space exploration is a force of nature unto itself that no other force in society can rival
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: If we drive down the cost of transportation in space, we can do great things
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: I think the human race doesn't have a future if it doesn't go into space
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: The space between the television set and the viewer is holy ground
en_quotes.author: Fred Rogers

en_quotes.quote: My brain is just so busy. I'm inattentive; I'm a daydreamer: the space cadet kind
en_quotes.author: Hannah Gadsby

en_quotes.quote: Find joy and solace in the simple, and cultivate your utopia by feeling the Tao in every cubic inch of space
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: When you're getting ready to launch into space, you're sitting on a big explosion waiting to happen
en_quotes.author: Sally Ride

en_quotes.quote: Coming home to a tidy, pulled-together space will help everything in your life feel the same way
en_quotes.author: Bobby Berk

en_quotes.quote: That's capital L, small a - no space! - capital C, small h, a, n, z, e
en_quotes.author: LaChanze

en_quotes.quote: We won't sit idly by when a crime is committed in the real world. So why should we when it happens in cyber space?
en_quotes.author: Max Baucus

en_quotes.quote: Be not entangled in this world of days and nights; Thou hast another time and space as well
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

en_quotes.quote: The rhythm of relations of color and size makes the absolute appear in the relativity of time and space
en_quotes.author: Piet Mondrian

en_quotes.quote: I'm very inspired by outer space
en_quotes.author: Selah Louise Marley

en_quotes.quote: I'm really excited about this generation of young women that can look at a screen and see some brown people in space
en_quotes.author: Tessa Thompson

en_quotes.quote: Vanity can create a very cruel space for you if you don't know how to manage it
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: It's about how you're using the space. That's what makes live music
en_quotes.author: Du Yun

en_quotes.quote: The most important thing about Spaceship Earth - an instruction book didn't come with it
en_quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

en_quotes.quote: My time on 'Roadies' gave me serenity and space
en_quotes.author: Machine Gun Kelly

en_quotes.quote: I can't say I've ever had a dream about space or that I ponder it all the time
en_quotes.author: John Glenn

en_quotes.quote: For me, art doesn't stop at the gallery space
en_quotes.author: Petra Collins

en_quotes.quote: Without consciousness, space and time are nothing
en_quotes.author: Robert Lanza

en_quotes.quote: The dinosaurs became extinct because they didn't have a space program
en_quotes.author: Larry Niven

en_quotes.quote: John Glenn's life will long be remembered for his time in space, his courage, and his service to all Americans
en_quotes.author: Katherine Johnson

en_quotes.quote: On a standard space shuttle crew, two of the astronauts have a test pilot background - the commander and the pilot
en_quotes.author: Sally Ride

en_quotes.quote: All architecture has a public nature, I believe, so I would like to make a public space
en_quotes.author: Tadao Ando

en_quotes.quote: I think I understand something about space. I think the job of a sculptor is spatial as much as it is to do with form
en_quotes.author: Anish Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: The show is called 'The Office,' and while it focuses on the people, the architecture of the space is very important
en_quotes.author: Brian Baumgartner

en_quotes.quote: Don't even try to talk to me when I'm watching the moon. That's my moon, baby
en_quotes.author: Wendelin Van Draanen

en_quotes.quote: Space isn't remote at all. It's only an hour's drive away if your car could go straight upwards
en_quotes.author: Fred Hoyle

en_quotes.quote: There are no passengers on spaceship earth. We are all crew
en_quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

en_quotes.quote: Language is a virus from outer space
en_quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: What is the use of a house if you haven't got a tolerable planet to put it on?
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Each time I think I've created time for myself, along comes a throwback to disrupt my private space
en_quotes.author: Wole Soyinka

en_quotes.quote: The stars don't look bigger, but they do look brighter
en_quotes.author: Sally Ride

en_quotes.quote: It is only in the world of objects that we have time and space and selves
en_quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: An all-white space has a purity that is refreshing and serene
en_quotes.author: Mary Helen Bowers

en_quotes.quote: Architecture is the art of how to waste space
en_quotes.author: Philip Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I think the universe is pure geometry - basically, a beautiful shape twisting around and dancing over space-time
en_quotes.author: Antony Garrett Lisi

en_quotes.quote: The modern artist is working with space and time, and expressing his feelings rather than illustrating
en_quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

en_quotes.quote: The rockets and the satellites, spaceships that we're creating now, we're pollinating the universe
en_quotes.author: Neil Young

en_quotes.quote: Architecture is the thoughtful making of space
en_quotes.author: Louis Kahn

en_quotes.quote: America has tossed its cap over the wall of space
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I don't know what you could say about a day in which you have seen four beautiful sunsets
en_quotes.author: John Glenn

en_quotes.quote: Everything has a natural explanation. The moon is not a god, but a great rock, and the sun a hot rock
en_quotes.author: Anaxagoras

en_quotes.quote: Between stimulus and response, there is a space where we choose our response
en_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

en_quotes.quote: I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Houston, Tranquillity Base here. The Eagle has landed
en_quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: I think we are at the dawn of a new era in commercial space exploration
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Karma is only in space time and causality. Your real self resides non-locally
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: I see nothing in space as promising as the view from a Ferris wheel
en_quotes.author: E. B. White

en_quotes.quote: I don't think the human race will survive the next thousand years, unless we spread into space
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: For NASA, space is still a high priority
en_quotes.author: Dan Quayle

en_quotes.quote: I've always been interested in arrival, and coming to a space, and even to looking back at where you were
en_quotes.author: James Turrell

en_quotes.quote: Make space in your life, space for health and happiness
en_quotes.author: Kris Carr

en_quotes.quote: I can't deal with someone wanting to take a relationship backward or needing space or cheating on you
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: Space ails us moderns: we are sick with space
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: Space in general gave us GPS - that's not specifically NASA, but it's investments in space
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: An optimist is a driver who thinks that empty space at the curb won't have a hydrant beside it
en_quotes.author: Jules Renard

en_quotes.quote: Space is almost infinite. As a matter of fact, we think it is infinite
en_quotes.author: Dan Quayle

en_quotes.quote: Be intentional with your space. Don't be afraid to step on a limb and design your home the way you love it
en_quotes.author: Joanna Gaines

en_quotes.quote: The scientific theory I like best is that the rings of Saturn are composed entirely of lost airline luggage
en_quotes.author: Mark Russell

en_quotes.quote: What we were seeing was a little bit like throwing the apple up in the air and seeing it blast off into space
en_quotes.author: Saul Perlmutter

en_quotes.quote: Your body has space within you that cannot die
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: Space only becomes ordinary when the frontier is no longer being breached
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: Time can behave like another direction in space under extreme conditions
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Perhaps one day I will go into space
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: I have wanted to fly into space for many years, but never imagined it would really be feasible
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: When we judge, we are always in a psychic space which is circular
en_quotes.author: Rene Girard

en_quotes.quote: The space station here is a magical place and an incredible science facility
en_quotes.author: Scott Kelly

en_quotes.quote: I am always floating around trying to tend to everyone and be free while at the same time enjoying some space
en_quotes.author: Jenna Morasca

en_quotes.quote: It doesn't matter what country or what political system you are from. Space brings you together
en_quotes.author: Valentina Tereshkova

en_quotes.quote: When I'm up, I'm over-exuberant; when I'm down, I just wander round on my own. I have no middle space
en_quotes.author: Simon Sebag Montefiore

en_quotes.quote: Most whale photos you see show whales in this beautiful blue water - it's almost like space
en_quotes.author: Brian Skerry

en_quotes.quote: Directing is very close to choreography; you deal with space, time, emotions, lighting, making beautiful images
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Millepied

en_quotes.quote: For me, a taxi is like a public space because so many people get in that space
en_quotes.author: Yasmine Hamdan

en_quotes.quote: We feel a lot of the future of storytelling is going to be in the VR space
en_quotes.author: Joe Russo

en_quotes.quote: Canada and space are a natural fit
en_quotes.author: Marc Garneau

en_quotes.quote: If the Sun and Moon should ever doubt, they'd immediately go out
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: Acting is about going into the space, and there are just some places that I'm not willing to go
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: That great Cathedral space which was childhood
en_quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

en_quotes.quote: Space enthusiasts are the most susceptible demographic to delusion that I have ever seen
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: If you want a nation to have space exploration ambitions, you've got to send humans
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: Architecture is the will of an epoch translated into space
en_quotes.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

en_quotes.quote: Space is an inspirational concept that allows you to dream big
en_quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

en_quotes.quote: Rocket science is tough, and rockets have a way of failing
en_quotes.author: Sally Ride

en_quotes.quote: Architecture must not do violence to space or its neighbors
en_quotes.author: I. M. Pei

en_quotes.quote: They say any landing you can walk away from is a good one
en_quotes.author: Alan Shepard

en_quotes.quote: If you're going to go to the moon, you don't shoot the rocket right at the moon. You have to go at it obliquely
en_quotes.author: Drew Houston

en_quotes.quote: After floating for nine and a half months in space, gravity is not your friend
en_quotes.author: Peggy Whitson

en_quotes.quote: When you launch in a rocket, you're not really flying that rocket. You're just sort of hanging on
en_quotes.author: Michael P. Anderson

en_quotes.quote: Competitive golf is played mainly on a five-and-a-half-inch course... the space between your ears
en_quotes.author: Bobby Jones

en_quotes.quote: If women can be railroad workers in Russia, why can't they fly in space?
en_quotes.author: Valentina Tereshkova

en_quotes.quote: I want to party in space because I make alien music
en_quotes.author: David Guetta

en_quotes.quote: My habit of glorifying things far away in space and time, also contributed to my social isolation
en_quotes.author: Luke Ford

en_quotes.quote: As long as you don't forgive, who and whatever it is will occupy rent-free space in your mind
en_quotes.author: Isabelle Holland

en_quotes.quote: The philosophy of FIFA is to expand world soccer space, to spread out the world football space
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

en_quotes.quote: The moon is a friend for the lonesome to talk to
en_quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

en_quotes.quote: I don't think there is anything wrong with white space. I don't think it's a problem to have a blank wall
en_quotes.author: Annie Leibovitz

en_quotes.quote: Mining asteroids will ultimately benefit humanity on and off the Earth in a multitude of ways
en_quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

en_quotes.quote: Islam is about finding your own space
en_quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

en_quotes.quote: One thing I probably share with everyone else in the astronaut office is composure
en_quotes.author: Sally Ride

en_quotes.quote: The fact that I was going to be the first American woman to go into space carried huge expectations along with it
en_quotes.author: Sally Ride

en_quotes.quote: The really wonderful thing that happened to me when I was in space was this feeling of belonging to the entire universe
en_quotes.author: Mae Jemison

en_quotes.quote: People like space. But they sometimes have been left out. People are much more open to that if you invite them in
en_quotes.author: Mae Jemison

en_quotes.quote: A word carries far, very far, deals destruction through time as the bullets go flying through space
en_quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

en_quotes.quote: I always wanted to be a cowboy, and Jedi Knights are basically cowboys in space, right?
en_quotes.author: Liam Neeson

en_quotes.quote: Space music'd be really something... but they don't have no gravity up there. You couldn't have no downbeat!
en_quotes.author: Miles Davis

en_quotes.quote: Role-playing games are just an organic improvised space for storytelling
en_quotes.author: Matthew Mercer

en_quotes.quote: Planets move in ellipses with the Sun at one focus
en_quotes.author: Johannes Kepler

en_quotes.quote: Through space the universe encompasses and swallows me up like an atom; through thought I comprehend the world
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: The Earth is the cradle of humanity, but mankind cannot stay in the cradle forever
en_quotes.author: Konstantin Tsiolkovsky

en_quotes.quote: Sculpture occupies the same space as your body
en_quotes.author: Anish Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: On Earth, men and women are taking the same risks. Why shouldn't we be taking the same risks in space?
en_quotes.author: Valentina Tereshkova

en_quotes.quote: I don't think I could live with anybody. I had roommates, and it's not for me. I like my space!
en_quotes.author: Ashley Benson

en_quotes.quote: Sex in space is not just a good idea, it's survival
en_quotes.author: Vanna Bonta

en_quotes.quote: People think that I live in a space pod, but it's pretty mid-century modern
en_quotes.author: Fred Schneider

en_quotes.quote: Anytime there is a new, interesting space that comes along, there are a bunch of companies that enter the market
en_quotes.author: Trip Adler

en_quotes.quote: If you ask me what's harder, being famous or flying to space, I'd say fame is much harder
en_quotes.author: Yi So-Yeon

en_quotes.quote: In a novel, you have space to develop a character or a scene. You don't have that luxury in a 700-800-word picture book
en_quotes.author: Kirby Larson

en_quotes.quote: Pioneering in space was something I would willingly give my life for
en_quotes.author: Scott Carpenter

en_quotes.quote: I could have gone on flying through space forever
en_quotes.author: Yuri Gagarin

en_quotes.quote: Oh, don't let's ask for the moon. We've already got the stars
en_quotes.author: Bette Davis

en_quotes.quote: Darkness is to space what silence is to sound, i.e., the interval
en_quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

en_quotes.quote: Land on Mars, a round-trip ticket - half a million dollars. It can be done
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: If anyone has a vested interest in space solar power, it would have to be me
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Space has always been confusing to politics
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: Obama's space policy doesn't differ much from George W. Bush's
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: In the United States there is more space where nobody is than where anybody is. That is what makes America what it is
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: I like black because it is a vacant space
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: I'm a little territorial and defensive. I don't like having my space invaded
en_quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

en_quotes.quote: Love is space and time measured by the heart
en_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

en_quotes.quote: Would I like to go into space? No. Maybe I'd do it when I'm old and have done everything else on this planet
en_quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

en_quotes.quote: The thought of a limit to perceptual space and time staggers the mind
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

en_quotes.quote: Space is the stature of God
en_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

en_quotes.quote: The vision is to figure out how there can really be dynamic entrepreneurialism in space
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes siblings can get in each other's space
en_quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

en_quotes.quote: No, I think most astronauts recognize that the space shuttle program is very high-risk, and are prepared for accidents
en_quotes.author: Sally Ride

en_quotes.quote: Losing my daughter was a very serious pain. There was always some empty space in my heart
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: I'm not reinventing the wheel here. I'm not Chuck Berry or Bill Monroe. Guys like that are from outer space
en_quotes.author: Chris Stapleton

en_quotes.quote: Geez, all that money we waste on space exploration; just think how many bombs that would buy!
en_quotes.author: Craig Bruce

en_quotes.quote: It's hard for us to really understand the immensity so far of the conquest of space
en_quotes.author: Walter Cronkite

en_quotes.quote: A space station is a rangy monstrosity, a giant erector set built by a madman
en_quotes.author: Mary Roach

en_quotes.quote: I don't spend too much time on social media, so I can protect my mind space
en_quotes.author: Sandra Oh

en_quotes.quote: Juggling is sometimes called the art of controlling patterns, controlling patterns in time and space
en_quotes.author: Ronald Graham

en_quotes.quote: There is always space for good music
en_quotes.author: Guru Randhawa

en_quotes.quote: We had 83 different space research projects on my last space flight in '98, and they covered the whole gamut
en_quotes.author: John Glenn

en_quotes.quote: As a community, we create a lot of space for fighting and pushing back, but not enough for connecting and healing
en_quotes.author: Tarana Burke

en_quotes.quote: If it hadn't been for the Cold War, neither Russia nor America would have been sending people into space
en_quotes.author: James Lovelock

en_quotes.quote: Adjusting to space is easier than adjusting to Earth for me
en_quotes.author: Scott Kelly

en_quotes.quote: You'd think that radio was around long enough that someone would have coined a word for staring into space
en_quotes.author: Ira Glass

en_quotes.quote: The novel is not so much a literary genre, but a literary space, like a sea that is filled by many rivers
en_quotes.author: Jose Saramago

en_quotes.quote: We are creatures of the moment; we live from one little space to another, and only one interest at a time fills these
en_quotes.author: William Dean Howells

en_quotes.quote: Man must at all costs overcome the Earth's gravity and have, in reserve, the space at least of the Solar System
en_quotes.author: Konstantin Tsiolkovsky

en_quotes.quote: The best would be to fly in space with family and friends
en_quotes.author: John M. Grunsfeld

en_quotes.quote: Once you've been in space, you appreciate how small and fragile the Earth is
en_quotes.author: Valentina Tereshkova

en_quotes.quote: It's like turning the space program over to the Long Island Railroad
en_quotes.author: David R. Brower

en_quotes.quote: When you feel comfortable about your game, you are in a happy space, feel at peace with yourself
en_quotes.author: Gautam Gambhir

en_quotes.quote: I am absolutely certain that life can exist in outer space, move around, find a new aqueous environment
en_quotes.author: Craig Venter

en_quotes.quote: And then when I went to Chicago, that's when I had these outer space experiences and went to the other planets
en_quotes.author: Sun Ra

en_quotes.quote: Performing tai chi in space - it is comfortable; we got more outer space chi
en_quotes.author: Liu Yang

en_quotes.quote: Our best theory of describing space at a fundamental level is probably string theory
en_quotes.author: Alan Guth

en_quotes.quote: I do not believe that anyone from outer space has ever visited the Earth
en_quotes.author: Alan Bean

en_quotes.quote: I have more than 70 space companies in the pipeline
en_quotes.author: Etienne Schneider

en_quotes.quote: The hand has the richest articulation of space
en_quotes.author: Eduardo Chillida

en_quotes.quote: Most people are completely unaware of their breath. They violate your space, they have no idea that they have halitosis
en_quotes.author: Larry David

en_quotes.quote: I've been lucky enough to fly to space twice
en_quotes.author: Chris Hadfield

en_quotes.quote: In so many and such important ways, then, do the planets bear witness to the earth's mobility
en_quotes.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

en_quotes.quote: My childhood dreams were focused on being part of the effort to make humanity a multiplanetary species
en_quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

en_quotes.quote: I don't think the space station is innovative. Going to the moon was innovative because we had no idea how to do it
en_quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

en_quotes.quote: I think humans will reach Mars, and I would like to see it happen in my lifetime
en_quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

en_quotes.quote: We must still think of ourselves as pioneers to understand the importance of space
en_quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

en_quotes.quote: I loved 'Space Ghost' when I was in college
en_quotes.author: Eric Andre

en_quotes.quote: Space is to place as eternity is to time
en_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

en_quotes.quote: I would have taken whatever hand I was dealt. Space was it
en_quotes.author: Story Musgrave

en_quotes.quote: The space shuttle is a better and safer rocket than it was before the Challenger accident
en_quotes.author: Sally Ride

en_quotes.quote: There is just one thing I can promise you about the outer-space program - your tax-dollar will go further
en_quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

en_quotes.quote: Well, I don't think we should go to the moon. I think we maybe should send some politicians up there
en_quotes.author: Ron Paul

en_quotes.quote: Architecture is about public space held by buildings
en_quotes.author: Richard Rogers

en_quotes.quote: Racism is a problem everywhere, especially in this country, but all over the world, and especially within queer space
en_quotes.author: Sasha Velour

en_quotes.quote: Houston, we've had a problem
en_quotes.author: Jim Lovell

en_quotes.quote: It would take an extremely large spacecraft to deflect a large asteroid that would be headed directly for the Earth
en_quotes.author: Rusty Schweickart

en_quotes.quote: The civil rights movement was about access to public space. We had to fight for public space
en_quotes.author: Jacqueline Woodson

en_quotes.quote: People do not choose Dropbox because it has this much space or gigabytes. They choose it for the experience
en_quotes.author: Drew Houston

en_quotes.quote: I think most astronauts are not risk takers. We take calculated risks for something that we think is worthwhile
en_quotes.author: Michael J. Massimino

en_quotes.quote: Unstructured play gives kids the space they need to tinker and take risks - both vital for the budding entrepreneur
en_quotes.author: Darell Hammond

en_quotes.quote: I think a good life-work balance is important, and that's even more important in some cases on the space station
en_quotes.author: Scott Kelly

en_quotes.quote: There's always room to volunteer. I think that's a huge space to be involved with
en_quotes.author: Halima Aden

en_quotes.quote: I already find pyramids from space. Is there anything cooler than that?
en_quotes.author: Sarah Parcak

en_quotes.quote: I like '1989,' the whole album. 'Welcome to New York,' 'Blank Space,' 'Bad Blood' - all of it!
en_quotes.author: Damian Lillard

en_quotes.quote: The greatest thing we can do is to give each other a safe space to truly, truly be ourselves in the world
en_quotes.author: Sara Bareilles

en_quotes.quote: I'm in a space of surrendering and being open and seeing. It's a good place to be - the only place to be
en_quotes.author: Sherilyn Fenn

en_quotes.quote: It is difficult to imagine evolution in alien planets operating in any manner other than Darwinian
en_quotes.author: Simon Conway Morris

en_quotes.quote: I've always been consumed by things that are out of this world, like space and moons
en_quotes.author: Manny MUA

en_quotes.quote: I left Aerospace because I wanted to go build, and put spacecraft together
en_quotes.author: Gwynne Shotwell

en_quotes.quote: The heart looks into space to be away from earth
en_quotes.author: Richard Jefferies

en_quotes.quote: I believe that there may be intelligent life on other planets
en_quotes.author: Pat Buckley

en_quotes.quote: The only medium where people are truly exploring themselves and going out to experiment is the digital space
en_quotes.author: Nia Sharma

en_quotes.quote: The head of NASA ought to be a space professional, not a politician
en_quotes.author: Bill Nelson

en_quotes.quote: Age can be wonderful for red wine, but not for spacecraft
en_quotes.author: Nathan Myhrvold

en_quotes.quote: I'm looking forward to coming back, back to Earth, the landing, the views
en_quotes.author: Duane G. Carey

en_quotes.quote: Those folks out in the space suits are going to be getting beat up
en_quotes.author: Duane G. Carey

en_quotes.quote: We want to make sure we get living astronauts to the surface of Mars
en_quotes.author: Ellen Stofan

en_quotes.quote: I'd love to go back to space, I don't know any astronaut who doesn't want to
en_quotes.author: Helen Sharman

en_quotes.quote: Building one space station for everyone was and is insane: we should have built a dozen
en_quotes.author: Larry Niven

en_quotes.quote: Eventually there are going to be cities in space
en_quotes.author: Alan Bean

en_quotes.quote: We knew it was going to be difficult to get to the moon. We didn't know how difficult
en_quotes.author: Alan Bean

en_quotes.quote: The sun and its retinue of planets drift as a group through the vast gulfs of space that separate the stars
en_quotes.author: Barney Oliver

en_quotes.quote: I see Earth! It is so beautiful!
en_quotes.author: Yuri Gagarin
